text: Muso guft: «Ej Parvardigori mo, ʙa Fir'avnu ʙuzurgoni qavmas dar in cahon zinatu (qasrho, xidmatgoron, markaʙhoi foxira) amvoli ʙuzurg dodai, to digaronro az rohi Tu gumroh kunand. Ej Parvardigori mo, amvolasonro noʙud soz va ʙar dilhojason muhr ʙineh, pas imon najorand, to on goh ki azoʙi dardovarro ʙuʙinand»
